overview: Easy, sleazy, and dirty.  That's what the short movies you could see in a peep machine were.  For the cost of a few coins, a variety of beautiful babes undressed before your eyes.  They weren't always glamorous, but they were always stacked.  And if you were lucky, maybe they had a little fun with themselves.  In the 1950s and 60s these little films were commonplace, but now they're part of a bygone era.  This collection brings together over an hour of those short subjects,a nd take you back to the days when ecstasy could be had for twenty-five cents.
title: Vintage Sleaze
